# title

**Instance Property**

The title of the change request.

## Declaration

```swift
var title: String { get set }
```

## Creating Change Requests

- **init(project:)**: Creates a change request around the specified project.
- **projectExtensionData**: Compressed project-specific data to use in the change request.
